p: The perception of a university member staff roles toward COVID‐19 pandemic questionnaire through distance education includes 54 items, was prepared by the researchers in this study. The PRQ‐54 consisted of four, that are: cognitive, skillful, health, and moral perceptions of the COVID‐19 pandemic. The individual responds with a 5‐point Likert scale (never = 1 to always = 5). The validity and reliability of the scale were verified. The results showed in Tables 1, 2, 3 indicate that the PRQ‐54 is validated and reliable.
